title: Design and Implementation of Online Collaborative Science Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Science Theories and Experience Using Online Communication Tools
context.additional_context: Medical/legal/technical experts collaborate on science domain projects in BYOD environments, integrating online collaborative activities using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can create science project proposals using online collaboration tools over four weeks
Learners can evaluate team members' contributions with over 80% accuracy based on peer assessment rubrics
Learners can perform asynchronous collaborative activities at least twice a week during the project period and document decision-making records.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
